SearchAgain.description: If 'True' and the program has failed to get the latest chapter of a manga, it'll search again. If 'False', the program will continue with the next manga.

ShowAmount.description: The amount of mangas the program will show on 'SHOW => LIST' option. If 'ALL' is selected, the program will show the entire list at once.

ChangeList.description: This option will let you change to another '.json' file a.k.a. manga list.

RestoreToDefault.description: This will restore the options above to default values.
